reviews.title: 5 stars photography, great app.
reviews.comment: This certainly is a must have app for photography lovers. Images are truly fabulous, you just need to find and follow the many great artists active on 500px and make sure to unfollow the \'me too\' other ones. The app itself works quite well overall, though the server responsiveness could certainly be improved. One suggestion: I would really like to have OFFLINE access to my favs.
reviews.author: D. Alex.

reviews.title: Sad!
reviews.comment: Super lag!! This was a great app! Sadly, due to laziness or lack of know how this app has be one bad! Simply put!
reviews.author: Gerard Barikian

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love this app very much as it helps with artistic inspiration when I get artists block. Back in the days of the old masters they would higher a model to stand for hours or travel carrying with them all their painting supplies. Today, we have 500px.  I can say that with my Galaxy S4 the loading of images is a LOT faster than the s3 and the iphones. It does drain battery slightly but with high quality images that\'s to be expected since the higher the pixels the more power it takes to load. Thank you 500px!
reviews.author: Nathan Lawrence

reviews.title: Love the apps new layout
reviews.comment: I love the \"Flow\"  section though. I wish you could choose that layout for viewing different categories also not just that one.
reviews.author: Eric Garc\303\255a

reviews.title: Cache 1.14gb ? What the...?
reviews.comment: Really? How so? I did not know what strangling my lg l9. Do something and implements in applications a cleaning operation or else. Is over my hands to clean all the time...
reviews.author: Iubesc Brasovul

reviews.title: A great app with a fatal flaw
reviews.comment: As a service, 500px is outstanding. Its major problem is that it will fill up your sdcard storage with cached images, which will slow down your system over time. It does this without bound, and it is common that 100,000+ images can quickly build up without the user knowing about it. I would flat-out avoid the app for this reason.
reviews.author: Sean Lumly

reviews.title: Three stars
reviews.comment: Because you can\'t download the pictures :\'( Fix that problem and I\'ll give it 5 Stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: All I wanted from 500px was this android app. Perfect.
reviews.author: Nuno Dias

reviews.title: Poor experience.
reviews.comment: Have to log in every time I open the application. Also take FOREVER to load anything - even on Wi-Fi. Has a lot of potential but really bad app.
reviews.author: No\303\253l Dong

reviews.title: Won\'t load full photo
reviews.comment: Why doesn\'t it load the full photo? It keeps displaying the low quality cropped version... :-(
reviews.author: Joris Berthelot

reviews.title: 500px stopped working
reviews.comment: I installed it awhile back. Worked perfectly. Then all of a sudden my phone is telling me(samsung galaxy s4) \"sorry 500px has stopped working\" please advise.  I am a 500px user and would like this app to work
reviews.author: Graham Hewer

reviews.title: Nice try
reviews.comment: The app is beautiful. The pictures are gorgeous...when they finally load. I\'m averaging about thirty seconds per picture. That\'s simply not quick enough for me to want to spend a few minutes here and there flicking through beautiful images. I guess I\'ll stick with the Flickr app until this speeds up.
reviews.author: Nate Miller

reviews.title: Was amazing now lagging!
reviews.comment: This app was brilliant. Since the last update though I can\'t use it even on WiFi. It lags to the point nothing loads and I need to keep signing in! Please fix it! Love 500px though.
reviews.author: David Drover

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to download to mobile devices
reviews.author: Kynndredd SYNNE

reviews.title: OMG This is beautiful on my Nexus 7 2013
reviews.comment: Wow, stunning on an HD display!
reviews.author: Andy Rhine

reviews.title: Too good
reviews.comment: Ultimate app
reviews.author: Abhinav Sharma

reviews.title: Veryy sloooow...
reviews.comment: The app in itself does what is expected and is well designed. But it is so slow! Where the Play Store takes 3 seconds to load a 10Mb update, this app takes 1 minute to load the thumbnails for one page! Please,  make it better.
reviews.author: Olivier Bugada

reviews.title: Cant log in...
reviews.comment: Want to log in bt fb, and i will only log in with fb... But cant That means i can never use it if it takes forever to fix...
reviews.author: Li ka fai

reviews.title: Annoyingly slow
reviews.comment: The application is annoyingly slow! Opening photos / notifications takes forever!

reviews.title: 5 star
reviews.comment: Excellant
